summary:
12 Years of World Class International FMCG experience, including 7 years in excise tax driven industries, 3 years of retail experience. 8 years and counting of Real Estate experience.

Solid breadth of financial knowledge (commercial & technical) working in UK and Internationally (Russia, 6 years). 

Results orientated with proven track record.

Qualified CIMA - July 2004.
